channel.title: 1 on Bogdan Penkovsky, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in 1 on Bogdan Penkovsky, PhD

item.title: In-Memory Resistive RAM Implementation of Binarized Neural Networks for Medical Applications
item.description: The results are very encouraging to reduce efficiently memory requirement of edge devices and thus to obtain low energy hardware. This is particularly useful for medical applications where little energy is available.
